reviewText: This Blu-ray only plays with captions across the screen in a foreign language (Not English). When I ordered this the product details on Amazon did not indicate this.

I was initially reluctant to obtain this box set because I wasn't sure if I'd be getting a Japanese-dubbed set, but nope. The first three movies of the classic "Hellraiser" phenomenon are here in one beautiful box set, a Japanese import. I now have all nine "Hellraiser" films in Blu-ray, and they look pretty damn good.
